net.corda.flows / NotaryFlow / Client / <init>

<init>

Client(stx: SignedTransaction)


Client(stx: SignedTransaction, progressTracker: ProgressTracker)

A flow to be used for obtaining a signature from a NotaryService ascertaining the transaction timestamp is correct and none of its inputs have been used in another completed transaction.

Exceptions

NotaryException - in case the any of the inputs to the transaction have been consumed by another transaction or the timestamp is invalid.
